website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few concerns, this affordable ankle bracelet in real silver comes in a timeless style and surprisingly affordable price.
pros: Earns praise for elegant features that include Italian crafted sterling silver that's rhodium-plated for added shine
Has faceted beads and a secure lobster claw clasp
Available in 9 or 10 inches, and in silver, rose, and tri-color
cons: A few reports of breakage, but the 30-day return policy is helpful

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The item looks exactly like the photos. The ankle bracelet came in a very nice box. I purchased this with the amazon suggested ankle bracelet. Both are great. I am so happy with the quality and the price was very fair!
customer_reviews.author: Crys_Marie

customer_reviews.title: Classic Summer Staple
customer_reviews.text: This is, simply put, one of the prettiest anklets I've ever owned. I'm so happy I decided to buy it! It's delicate, a little sparkly without being flashy, and sits on the ankle so comfortably. I hardly notice it at all, and I never take it off. It's lasted through showers and swimming pools and pants. Sturdy and perfect. Love this so much, and in the event that it breaks, I'll definitely be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney McCarthyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect anklet
customer_reviews.text: So elegant, pretty and simple. I've worn it everywhere (shower, pool, sweaty run) for a week and it still looks amazing. 9" fits my ankle perfectly. I measured against my previous (broken) anklet to ensure it would be the right fit and it is.
customer_reviews.author: Canadian Book Girl

customer_reviews.title: Get it NOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 1 previously & luv it! I had another plain anklet that just broke so I said, hey, why not have matching ones!!! It goes with everything & I luv the way it sparkles!! Looks expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Class all the way
customer_reviews.text: This anklet already gets great reviews, but I have to add mine also. It is a beautiful anklet, very classy and well made. It sparkles and shines in the light and looks strong enough to last a long time. The packaging is just beautiful. It comes with an outside box cradling the long inside box which holds the anklet. The packaging alone makes it look much more expensive than it is because of the high quality of the boxes. Overall it is a great buy and I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Faye Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have work this anklet nearly everyday all summer. Looks pretty. The diamond cut makes it glitter ever so slightly without being gaudy and cheap looking. Good quality for price. it survived a week of daily ocean swimming in the Caribbean.
customer_reviews.author: Elza V

customer_reviews.title: Pictures DO NOT do it justice!
customer_reviews.text: It did not look like the pictures, I repeat it does not! It looks WAY better in person. Seems very expensive and high quality. I have small ankles and the 9 inches wasn’t too big nor small. My four fingers fit through but it’s not extremely loose. I could have used a smaller size one for a more fitted anklet. It comes in a little box and perfect for a gift to a special lady in your life. Very shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Bracelet Stays New Long Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this anklet in 2015 and never took it off. I bathed, swam, and wore it under hosiery without snagging them and never had to remove it. It never faded and always sparkled. I broke it when I was lotioning my legs and stuck my thumb through it, pulled up, and it broke. It became such a part of my body I didn't feel it caught in my thumb. So I'm ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey G. Payton

customer_reviews.title: Looks Terrific and Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I buy tons of thing from Amazon, and this is a terrific buy. I wanted a 14kt anklet, but they are so expensive and who is going to be examining an anklet up close anyway. Rarely wear any jewelry that is not 14kt or 18kt and this would fool most anyone. I wear in the tub, never take it off. The rhodium and gold finished beads look great, and I would think the piece cost considerably more. If it lasts even a few months it is well worth the price. Meaure your ankle before ordering. I have very small ankles, and I doubt that it would fit someone who has a large ankle.
customer_reviews.author: sherri garner

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: This ankle bracelet is prettier than the picture. It is nice enough to wear with a dress yet would look great with shorts and tennis shoes. The size is large enough that it just hangs loosely on your ankle and plenty of room that it does not get tight and break when you bend your ankle (my ankles are basically average size, but have had issues with some ankle bracelets braking.) It's really a cute ankle bracelet!
customer_reviews.author: J Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The ankle bracelet is as pretty as advertised. The size was perfect--glad I went with 10" vs 9". I have only had it one day so can't comment on durability of wear or color but am pleased so far. The order came quickly and was appropriately packaged. Thank you. UPDATE: I did order the 9" NOT the 10" as stated in my initial review and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty cute. I'd been seeing a lot of people with ankle bracelets this season, but didn't know how I'd feel about having one on so I didn't want to spend too much money. I thought this was going to look cheap, but it looks like nice bling (from afar). I really like it. It adds a little elegance and hipness at the same time. Be careful though, I have rather small ankles and it fits me just fine. Normal-to-larger sized ankles might need a larger size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lampkin

customer_reviews.title: Had it for over a year!!
customer_reviews.text: If your considering getting this, go for it! You won't regret it. I shopped about for an anklet that was cute design, size and color. This had all I was looking for. I didn't want to splurge for one that would lose its sine. This ones doesn't! Worn it in the shower, beach, pool--still has its shine! love it! It been about a month no problems. Great purchase. UPDATA: I still have and love this anklet. I seriously have never taken it off and Its been a little over a year!!! It is not dull, at all such a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nmllw

customer_reviews.title: Stunning anklet that stands up to everything!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this anklet. It's still as shiny and beautiful as the day I bought it and I've worn it every day without taking it off (going on five months now), and that includes in the shower, at the beach, in the ocean, etc. It's the perfect size, both in the length and in the size of the chain-- it's got a delicate look but is super strong at the same time. SO sparkly and I love the white gold/rose gold combo. I'll wear this forever!
customer_reviews.author: Eve D.

customer_reviews.title: I first ordered the 10" because my last anklet measured ...
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the 10" because my last anklet measured 10" but this one was too big, maybe because the rope on my last one was thicker? Anyway I turned around and order the 9" and it this fits perfectly. I will give the 10" as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Fragile as an old dry branch
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty but pretty low quality. Within 3 weeks, both ends of the clasp broke one after the other in the space of a week. My wife wore it together with a gold anklet which she doesn't take off and has worn for years. So it's not her, its the product. Its simply not made to last.
customer_reviews.author: ban

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for something else.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 0 star rating if it would have let me. I was going to return but missed my window. Life is crazy right now with COVID-19 going on. Anyways this looks so beautiful in the pictures but I feel like it’s made with junk. You can tell by the touch it’s made extremely cheap. There’s no shine to this product what so ever . I feel like I got a returned product that was used by someone else.. it looks like it’s discolored. Ugh I’m just so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: the small one was definitely really tiny and left no room to walk comfortably. I've had this one for three months straight ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to send my first one back and get a bigger size, even though I'm "average", the small one was definitely really tiny and left no room to walk comfortably. I've had this one for three months straight and haven't taken it off, even for the beach, pool, exercising or anything. There's no visible wear so far. It's the perfect size and has just enough sparkle! I get lots of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive Anklet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this anklet - just what I was looking for! It is appropriately thin for an ankle with great sparkle! Perfect! Nicely made and looks great on my ankle - fits very well. Hope this lasts a long time as I keep this on, thru sleep, shower, swimming, whatever... Very pleased with this purchase - glad I took the chance and ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Very sparkly and pretty! Also comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many great reviews already but I wanted to just mention how sparkly and comfortable this anklet is. I don’t like big jewelries and only wear stud earrings and wedding ring because usually they feel like they get in my way. But this anklet is comfortable and I usually don’t notice that I’m wearing them but still adds a little dainty feminine touch. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Helgacakes

customer_reviews.title: SO DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this anklet and it broke within a few weeks of having it. (I don’t do nothing extreme with it on. Sports etc.) I was always super gentle. When it broke, I fixed it and moved on. Today it broke and fell off. I don’t know where it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! You will not regret!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an ankle bracelet from other brands like Pura Vida, but their ankle bracelets only come in 9 inches and they don’t sell sterling silver. My concern was it would tarnish over time. But I love that I can finally fit an ankle bracelet! 10 inches is just perfect. I’ve been wearing it for over a month and I haven’t taken it off in the shower. The shine and sparkle is still there since day one. I love it so much that I bought the 9 inch version for my daughter. She loves the sparkle and the fact that she matches with her mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning! Comfortable fit and good quality. I have not taken it off since I've received it (7/14/19). I've been to the beach and pool and it still has it's beautiful shimmer. When the sunlight hit it, it's so gorgeous. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mrshewson

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, even more cute than the pics. Looks super n ice, I bathe with it, only minimal color change at clip after about a month of not taking it off at all but blends in because the clip is gold & had silver accents. Super cute would recomend or buy as a gift for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Puga

customer_reviews.title: On the small side
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my niece. It was tight on her so I had to buy the bigger size. She does not have big ankles. I would recommend that you size up unless you have tiny ankles. Otherwise it is really cute. Looks well made and is shipped in a nice box so you can give it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: B. Petereson

customer_reviews.title: A good choice for an ankle bracelet
customer_reviews.text: A nice ankle bracelet, sturdy and durable. I wear it all the time.it has maintained it's shine, and it is comfortable. I live in a warm climate and wear sandals all the time. This matched my sterling silver and gold filled toe ring perfectly. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! Bought this last season and wore it day and night through a busy summer. When I put in on again this season it lasted about a month, but I liked it so much I decided to get another. Holding up well after several weeks, so I have high hopes it will last through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but doesn’t last long!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, expensive-looking anklet. I have average sized ankles and purchased the 9”, but probably could’ve gone with the 10” to wear it lower on my ankle. It seemed to be good quality, because I’ve had it for almost 6 months, but unfortunately the clasp broke yesterday! That’s why I’m giving it only 3 stars. I feel as though for the price it should have lasted a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Italian Sterling Silver Rhodium Plated Diamond Cut Oval and Round Beads Mezzaluna
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my Wife. It broke literally the next day after her receiving it on Christmas. I did order a replacement. And so far that one has held up. Will update this if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Andreana Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Reviews were correct on how this anklet sparkles! The cut and tri-colors really are beautiful. I've been wearing it everyday, working out, shower, beach, lakes... Still looking great after about a month. It's thick enough to be durable but still delicate looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie Bear

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: This ankle bracelet is lovely, and can be worn with any jewelry...gold or silver! I think for most adults, the 10 inch is the better choice. I have slim ankles. and I was glad I selected the longer one. It is a more graceful fit.
customer_reviews.author: Meri

customer_reviews.title: loveee love love
customer_reviews.text: This anklet is super classy and delicate. I love how simple it looks but the detail on it is really pretty. I used to have one like it years ago but while I moved I lost it. I think this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 9" which is a perfect size for me... wore it for yoga today and no worries. Not to mention, it is beautiful, it's delicately classy and the colors go with every outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Cute but delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute but it came broken. I meant to return it but missed the return window. I also previously bought the silver one and that one was good. Just wish this didn’t arrive broken then I could actually wear it :(
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: SUPER cute and SO MUCH BANG for your BUCK!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT price for the perfect amount of BLING! I always wear an anklet, regardless of the time of year, and never take them off to shower, sleep, or workout. This one is dainty while sturdy, and the best part? The color of the metal has not turned dull!!! Plus it’s so comfortable I forget I’m wearing it... I’ve worn it for a couple months now and bought (2) more to give as Holiday gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Namaste323

customer_reviews.title: you will be happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering (my dog jumped on me and broke it, repair would have been 15.00, so I bought a new one). This anklet is beautiful, it hold it's color and sparkles. I highly recommend it. I have thicker ankles, so them making it in larger sizes is just wonderful. Great Purchase
customer_reviews.author: RFL

customer_reviews.title: ankle bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the prettiest ankle bracelets I've ever seen! I bought one for my daughter for Mother's Day & I just received one today from my husband. It's very nicely made and looks so beautiful on! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: Love! Looks dainty and feminine, but holds up very well. (This is the second one I bought. The first was gold - bought a year ago - and this one is tricolor. So happy with both purchases.)
customer_reviews.author: Freckles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Exceeds Expectations. If you are thinking of purchasing this anklet...do it...you want be disappointed. It is absolutely beautiful. It came in a lovely box and when I opened it and the light danced off the sparkling chain..WOW. I was truly blown away by its beauty and price. Very, very, resonable. I am so very happy with this purchase and you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Looney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful anklet for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty anklet. The price is amazing for what you get. The anklet is sparkes. Doesn't turn your skin black. I wear it 24/7 and it's still on my ankle. I love it
customer_reviews.author: roseanne

customer_reviews.title: Looked good with constant wear for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Eventually the plating wears off,but it's classy, attractive & looks like more expensive ones
customer_reviews.author: LilMar

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: So far so good....I never take it off and it's held up. Nice colors and it catches the light to create sparkles. I'll update this if it ever breaks off.
customer_reviews.author: Christine T

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This ankle bracelet is absolutely stunning the quality appears to be A1 but my bracelet recently broke which is weird because I just got it I would have gave it five stars but because it broke I’m only giving it 2 stars is still a pretty bracelet but I’m very disappointed that it broke so fast.
customer_reviews.author: JayBees

customer_reviews.title: This anklet is a must buy....5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I love my anklet. The Italian Sterling Silver anklet is elegant and classy. I feel comfortable wearing it everyday, and I have received many compliments. It's a must buy for the price. Every woman who enjoys wearing anklets should have one in their jewelry wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: gwen brooks

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of jewelry! Seems very sturdy, bigger than expected and it has lots of shimmer! Wife loves to wear anklets and once she puts them on, she rarely take them off! Let's see how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: John M Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and unique
customer_reviews.text: Love it, super pretty and makes you feel good. I always wanted an ankle bracelet and I am very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Anklet I Wear Constantly
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and has gone through a lot since I wear it constantly. I also liked the price, since I have a tendency to lose these. Update: I still love this anklet and have it in a couple of styles. But it does break pretty easy. I wear it all the time, so I will now take it off if I'm not going out or it won't show and I suggest others do the same.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.text: I got the silver and rose gold color. It's beautiful! I got this to replace a solid gold anklet that broke. It is just as pretty. Seems to be well made. I have been wearing it a couple of months now and haven't taken it off . It's holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Adorable anklet!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Gotten lots of compliments on it. It’s just the right amount of sparkle for the summer. I’ve worn it in the shower, at the beach and in the pool and no discoloration of either the anklet or any staining on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: T. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Not made for small ankles
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, dazzling expensive looking piece I'm very pleased with it. I have small ankles so it goes jus above the heal of my foot it would probably fall off if I didn't have one, lol..the quality is also pretty good I'd refer them and will also purchase from them again
customer_reviews.author: Happy50

customer_reviews.title: Adorable- quality just ok
customer_reviews.text: Loved this anklet! Dainty, adorable and looked very nice... but it fell apart about 197 times. I loved it so much I searched for it each time I lost it. Even found it in the yard after my husband mowed and put it back on. Lost it for good today somewhere out in public. Meh 😕
customer_reviews.author: ashley perkins

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I got the rose gold version and it is just beautiful. i was hesitant because of the price, but it was well worth it. I have been wearing it nonstop for about 2 months including showering and it is still SO sparkly and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: its beautiful. Now its is more than 3 months I have it. Swimming, shoes, sandals, showers. It’s sturdy, looks great. Colors not fading.
customer_reviews.author: Ajna Kenning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect color.
customer_reviews.text: This is really quite pretty! Very delicate, and it sparkles and shines. As a side note: I swim 2 miles daily, and this has held up beautifully despite the large amount of chlorine and chemicals it comes in contact with. No tarnish, no dullness. A lovely product!
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Nice anklet but not sure about clasp
customer_reviews.text: Although I liked this ankle bracelet, it must have fallen off my ankle within a week of wearing so I no longer have it😒
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Perry

customer_reviews.title: elegant and sparklingly beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 6 anklets in total. Two separate purchases. It’s elegant and sparklingly beautiful. I kept one and gifted the rest to my girlfriends and sister. However.... DO NOT WEAR WHILE SWIMMING IN THE OCEAN. It will dull the polish. :(
customer_reviews.author: Fary

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This is just amazing, I bought 2 , could not choose one so ordered 2 and loving them both. But this one alone also is fabulous!!! Must buy and it’s worth it. It’s been 2 days I am wearing and not removed even under shower , so far they are doing great.
customer_reviews.author: lakshmi

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly and noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Love this sturdy and beautiful anklet. It would make a great gift for a friend. I have several gold bracelets but they don't show up like this does. It really sparkles across a room at night!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Rettig

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my bracelet about two weeks ago now. A) It came next day. Seriously less than 24 hours later, it was in my mailbox. B) I've worn it nonstop and through the shower water, sweat from the gym, running outside in the rain, and having it rub against jeans and long pants, it's still intact and sparkling. I'll definitely be updating my review in a few months but as of right now, I completely recommend this anklet.
customer_reviews.author: Megenn

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Fell apart after the third time wearing it
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty ankle bracelet, and looks better on than it does in the pictures. It is a little heavier than my other anklets, but I got used to it over time. I wanted a darker colored one and this works nicely. UPDATE: I originally posted 5 stars because it is very pretty. But today I tried to put it on - only the third time - and the part the clasp connects to fell off. Just fell apart before I even tried to put it on. I barely touched it and the thing fell off. This is a colossal waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Luna

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my favorite anklet, and I have a good few of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite anklet, and I have a good few of them. I don't know why but the mix of silver and black just looks good to me. It fits well on my ankle even though they're wider than average. The clasp is sturdy but easy to get on and off. I often find I feel odd without it on, like I'm missing it. So I guess that means I like it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Sparkles/well made
customer_reviews.text: This anklet sparkles beautifully. Have worn daily and no problems. Very nice bracelet for the money.
customer_reviews.author: K...

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bernardi Oval Moon bracelet gifted to me for my birthday but when I went to purchase an anklet to match, they were sold out. This anklet looks very similar, just a little smaller beading. It is very eye catching and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this ankle bracelet - I ordered the Tri-Color Diamond cut and it is just soft gentle colors. I have only it it a few weeks and I wear it at all times (sleep, shower etc.) and it seems to be holding up well. I paid a lot more for a bracelet that lasted less than a month. So far, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this looks perfect on my leg
customer_reviews.text: i have very small ankles, this fit's perfectly. this is my second one, i purchased the first one a little over a year ago. because my ankle is slim they slide down a bit and then break. this looks perfect on my leg. i feel naked without it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This ankle bracelet was a gift to my daighter. It was absolutely beautiful amd she loved it. She immediately wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M. DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I have had it on my ankle since I purchased it. I shower and go into the pool and ocean with it. Great buy! Looks expensive. Great as a gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: I order three of these anklets (one in each color) for my three daugthers. They absolutely fell in love with them when they opened them. The sizing was perfect (try to measure ankle) and the box they arrived in look like they came from an upscale jeweler - seriously. They make wonderful gifts. Excellent quality! Will buy more in the future for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Cheree Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one I love it the quality is excellent Reasonable price and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Mai T.

customer_reviews.title: I just love it for summer
customer_reviews.text: This ankle bracelet looks so expensive. It matches everything you wear because of the combination rose tone sterling silver color. I just love it for summer. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: I love it! The only reason I just gave it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The only reason I just gave it 4 stars is because I’ve just had it about a week. It looks great though and I shower with it and haven’t taken it off and so far so good. Looks dainty and elegant. Definitely worth the money so far.
customer_reviews.author: E. Southers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It is so sparkly and simple. I love it so much I bought it TWICE! I even wear it to teach water aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: angela d

customer_reviews.title: A FABULOUS ANKLET
customer_reviews.text: better than expected, plenty big for my larger than average ankle, shiny and sturdy... even after wearing non-stop! six months later, still going! UPDATE two years later: haven't taken it off yet, wear it everyday year 'round! It has never snagged on a sock or stocking! Still liking it so much, I am about to order a second one, for a layered look, or maybe for my other ankle!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vee M

customer_reviews.title: Classy look !
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful! The “cut” of the silver gives the illusion of diamonds on the ankle! An exquisite look! So glad I bought this! Classy! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie C

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love ankle braceletes, but I keep losing them! I still have this one! And it is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mordea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this ankle bracelet. Has been in the ocean multiple times and still shiny and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Linnane

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Compliments
customer_reviews.text: Fave!! Sturdy and Real Sterling Silver! Love the way it sparkles and it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: I got this as it had good reviews and the quality looked nice on the web ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as it had good reviews and the quality looked nice on the web site. Finally gave to a friend as a gift.. and they put it on and by the end of the evening - it was broken.. no way to fix :(. It's past the time of purchase so no way to exchange or refund. Guess I will not order things for gifts so early in advance in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Warthen

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and dandy! I have only wore a few times because i think its too pretty to wear daily
customer_reviews.author: PaulieGirl615

customer_reviews.title: In love. Rosegold is my absolute favorite
customer_reviews.text: In love. Rosegold is my absolute favorite, and this had proven to be good quality so far - especially considering the price! I've bought cheap anklets in the past that fell off easily, had stiff clasps, or just broke far too early. Haven't had this long but so far it seems promising :)
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small pop of bling. I've gotten many compliments over the summer and have been pleasantly surprised at how well it's held up considering I haven't taken it off since it arrived a couple of months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done!
customer_reviews.text: Sparkle beautifully!! Lays low on my ankle and is very lightweight. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: YA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive design. My 18 yo daughter loves it, even though I'm the one wearing it. It fits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful anklet!
customer_reviews.text: Got this anklet today! I love it. I hope it doesn't turn. It sparkles and shines and I can't wait to wear it in my cruise and everyday! This picture doesn't give it justice. Trust me you will love it! I'm said to say that although this anklet looks just like it did the day I bought it, it broke in half today.
customer_reviews.author: T Kirkley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t turn green
customer_reviews.text: I take showers and baths with mine on and it still sparkles and doesn’t turn. I’m pretty clumsy and rough and so far mine hasn’t broken. Fingers crossed. Have had it for almost 2 months now. Xoxo
customer_reviews.author: april millz

customer_reviews.title: Wore daily for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this anklette and wore it daily. I wore it in the shower, at pedicures and in my winter boots. Sadly, when I woke up yesterday, it fell to the floor broken after 4 months. Time to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine DMV

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I love this anklet. I barely know it’s there. It’s very shiny and beautiful. I’m trying to buy a matching bracelet,
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Gooding

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Had this anklet for 4 years wore it in all types of water and never took it off. Alas the time has come to buy a new one but after 4 years I’m ok buying another one this product is great
customer_reviews.author: Nadjah Alle

customer_reviews.title: Attractive anklet jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 9" anklet; fits perfectly! As many reviewers have stated, it has quite an attractive sparkle to it...not gaudy, just enough to catch your eye. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Anklet!
customer_reviews.text: This anklet is absolutely beautiful. The three golds (gold, white gold and rose gold) are so pretty and sparkles. Love it! I have been wearing mine for two years. Wear it in the shower, swimming and while gardening. It still shines like new. I order one for my daughter, sister and niece. I will be ordering a couple more for friends and the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Masson

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this anklet, but decided to take a chance. So glad I did. I put it on and haven't taken it off and it's been a little over a month. It's comfortable and has retained its' shine. I don't plan on removing it until I have to pack away my sandals for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: K. Buck

customer_reviews.title: lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! My ankle measures about 8.5 inches and I like how the 10 inch anklet fits me. It hits right at the ankle bone. The 9 inch would've been too tight for my personal preference, so I'm glad I went with the 10 inch. Can't wait for warmer weather now so I can break out the flip flops and wear it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Manders78

customer_reviews.title: So shiny
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far and the 9” fits perfect! Showered with it and hasn’t tarnished or turned my skin green
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Ankle chain
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these. One for me and two as gifts. I haven't taken mine off since I got it. Durable and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It is very beautiful. I saw the high reviews and decided to order it even though it it was more plain than what I was looking for. It is much more beautiful and more sparkly than it shows in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: RONNA FIELD

customer_reviews.title: Love this anklet
customer_reviews.text: It's very thin so doesn't get hung up on things. I wore it under my socks because I was too lazy to take it off and it was fine. I slept with it on also with no issues. I'm very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Still on my ankle 3.5 years later
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in July of 2015. It has left my ankle three times so I could clean it and then it goes right back on. I’ve worn it swimming, showering, mowing the lawn, etc. it is still in -*perfect* condition! If you are considering purchasing and have any doubts about it’s quality, rest assured that you will get a great item at a fantastic price. I hope you enjoy yours as much I enjoy wearing mine!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This anklet is perfect. It does not irritate the skin, it holds it's sparkle and color and it is very sturdy and durable. i have not taken it off since i purchased it. My new favorite piece of jewelry for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: sheila reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that doesn't break!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying for some time to find an anklet bracelet that doesn't break easily. This one is great! It's pretty, simply stated and so far, no breakage! I'm a yoga instructor and barefoot a lot. I love the pretty touch. I've worn it for the last month 24/7 and it's still on and fine. Classes both teaching, demos and my own practice. Spin classes, paddle boarding in the ocean. Showers etc. Very happy especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jmachine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Holly !!! This is so beautiful. I hope it last ! GET IT. I will order another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

product_meta.title: Italian Sterling Silver Rhodium Plated Diamond Cut Oval and Round Beads Mezzaluna Chain Ankle Bracelet
product_meta.description:
THE AMAZON CURATED COLLECTION


Discover the Amazon Curated Collection of fine and fashion jewelry. The expansive selection of high-quality jewelry featured in the Amazon Curated Collection offers everyday values that range from precious gemstone and diamond pieces to the latest fashion designs.

This hand-selected assortment features an array of diamond, gemstone, and precious metal designs that receive a quality inspection, including from Amazon’s staff graduate gemologist, to ensure they meet Amazon’s high standards. All diamonds featured in the Amazon Curated Collection are certified by our suppliers to be conflict free, and IGI, GIA, or AGS certifications are provided on white diamonds of .75 carats or larger on all stud earrings, rings, and pendant necklaces.

Pieces from the Amazon Curated Collection come packaged in a custom box, making them wonderful gifts. In addition, we offer free one-day shipping within the continental U.S. on items over $500. International shipping options for friends and family overseas are available for an additional fee.

The Amazon Curated Collection offers a specialized customer service team that is available seven days a week to answer any product questions before, during or after the purchase. If you’re not satisfied for any reason, you will receive a full refund and free return shipping within the U.S. if you return your purchase within 30 days.

Find a special gift for a loved one or a beautiful piece that complements your personal style with jewelry from the Amazon Curated Collection. 

Sterling Silver History

Experts believe that silver alloy, used today as sterling silver, originated in continental Europe in the 12th century. Pure silver was found to be a soft and easily damageable material. When combined with other metals, most commonly cooper, it produced a tougher material that could be heavily relied on. Throughout the next few centuries, sterling silver was used as currency and for household items. It was often used as silverware and became the material used in a proper table setting between 1840 and 1940 throughout the United States and Europe. Because of this popularity, silver companies began to grow. During this craze, companies began to experiment using sterling silver compositions in jewelry, as it was a material that was easy to mold into intricate designs and gave a luxurious look with its metallic finish. Today, sterling silver is widely used in all kinds of jewelry styles and shines as beautifully as other precious metals, with the benefit of affordable pricing.

Sterling Silver Composition

While pure silver can be combined with many different types of metals, sterling silver is created when combining pure silver with copper. Sterling silver jewelry can be composed with different amounts of copper but is most often seen with the .925 stamp, meaning that the composition is of 92.5 percent silver and 7.5 percent copper. This has been found to be a good combination for maintaining the silver's durability without harming its sparkle.

Caring for Your Sterling Silver Jewelry

Silver should not come into contact with harsh household chemicals such as bleach, ammonia, or chlorine. To avoid scratches, store silver in a lined jewelry box or pouch, as it is prone to tarnish as it naturally reacts with sulfur or hydrogen sulfide in the air. Cleaning and wearing silver jewelry regularly will prevent this and help maintain its shine. Immediately upon noticing any discoloration, use a gentle polish made specifically for removing tarnish.

feature_bullets: Two-tone sterling silver anklet featuring faceted round and oval beads

These silver pieces are built for longevity. This piece features a metal plating or flashing, or an electrocoating for a more lustrous appearance, but it can wear off with long-term or heavy use. To ensure the longevity of your plated items store your jewelry in a dark, cool, dry place such as a pouch or air tight box and avoid rubbing plated items together. Also try to avoid exposure to cleaning products and perfume which can both negatively affect your items. Your local jeweler can advise you where to send your jewelry if you would ever like them replated.
